name: Pirate

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit  range 80/320 ft.  one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

actions.name: Pirates rob merchant ships on the high seas and in coastal waters
actions.desc: Pirate statistics can also be used to represent armed sailors.

document__title: Level Up Advanced 5e Monstrous Menagerie OGL
